skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Rare and majestic, Jade Longma only allow themselves to be ridden by the truly worthy.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Astride such a fearsome, magic-empowered creature, the will of the Celestial is executed by his servants both above and upon the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am no Dragon, no mighty being descended to guide you! But I am their will! I am their Hand! And so too will you be!"
"Be as the Great Bastion!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.

skillTree.localised_description: "Be as the bite of the Dragon!"
"Be as the falling comet!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: "…and I shall be all these things, and more!"

effects.description: Attacks cause "Rattled" effect, reducing combat ability

skillTree.localised_description: Those who stand shoulder to shoulder with the sky will never fall to the earth.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Dragon Emperor guides every sword and spear of the northern provinces, inspiring a strength of arms to match an unflinching strength of will.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: From lowly peasant to expert marksman, every arrow of the east soars with a Draconic power and grace.

skillTree.localised_description: Ancient Cathay stands historically unconquered. Booming cannons and rockets of exploding fire help ensure it will remain so.

skillTree.localised_description: Who can withstand a charge with the sweeping force of a hundred hooves in unison?

skillTree.localised_description: Even the most inexperienced peasant rallies under the cold-eyed gaze of Cathay's most stoic guardians.

skillTree.localised_description: When fire hangs in the sky above the battlefield, death is sure to rain down upon it.

skillTree.localised_description: Cathayan armies have been tested time and again, their skills proven in a tumultuous arena of bloodshed and near-constant war.

skillTree.localised_description: When the raging of battle begins, swift hands and swifter feet are the keys to surviving at range.

skillTree.localised_description: Swift, steady and moving as one, the hardy warriors of Cathay race headlong into battle.

Speed: +10% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel, Jade Lion, Jet Lion, Celestial Lion, Wu Xing War Compass and Zhangu War Drum units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.localised_description: A blanket of glowing lights amidst the clouds is sure to stir the heart of every Cathayan warrior beneath them.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Sky Lantern, Sky-junk, Onyx Crowmen and Great Moon Bird units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Sky Lantern, Sky-junk, Onyx Crowmen and Great Moon Bird units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
All warriors of honour and pride are eager to fight under the Dragon-Emperor's banners.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Every wound that is not fatal is but a lesson to learn from.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The blood-soaked battlefields of the northern provinces are the proving grounds upon which the mightiest warriors of Cathay have honed their craft.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has opened their mind to ideas and concepts that would bewilder a lesser person, enabling them to harness the Winds and manipulate them with skill.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: adds the ability that grants the spell intensity
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Very little escapes this one's notice.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There's something to be said for remaining positive in the face of unspeakable odds.
A dashing scar completes any true warrior's look.
"The trick is to think two steps ahead… and then think one step ahead of that."
No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
